name: An improved Adsense Console design
description:
Webmasters, bored by your habitual Adsense Console (where you can see all the stats, manage your ads, etc) ? Change its design ! 
For more visibility of statistics in the tables, a border for each td has been added, plus a new dark background more clear and restful, and some new things such as hovers. 

This style is under construction, so if you have any suggestion please don't hesitate.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("www.google.com") {#summarytable a {color:#fff !important; text-decoration: none !important; font-family: trebuchet ms !important; font-weight:bold !important;padding:1px !important;border:1px solid #666666 !important;}#summarytable a:hover{border-color: #C0C0C0!important; text-decoration:none !important; background:#999999 !important;}#summarytable td{padding:8px !important;border:1px solid #999999 !important;padding:5px !important;background:#666666 !important; color:white !important;}#summarytable tfoot td {background:#CCCCCC !important; color:#000 !important; font-size:130% !important; font-family:trebuchet ms !important;}.balance {padding: 5px !important; border:1px solid #999999 !important;margin: 10px 5px 5px 2px !important;}.rtl-safe-align-left {width:500px !important;} }
